stores.name: arguments
stores.description: Arguments turn the users' input into parameters passed to commands.

stores.name: commands
stores.description: Commands take input from a user, and return some output in the form of a message.

stores.name: events
stores.description: Event pieces run when their respective Discord event is emitted, with the relevant parameters.

stores.name: extendables
stores.description: Extendables add methods and properties to pieces to allow you to re-use methods and common code.

stores.name: finalizers
stores.description: Finalizers are small functions which run after a command has executed.

stores.name: inhibitors
stores.description: Inhibitors run before a command, and decide whether or not the user is allowed to run that command.

stores.name: languages
stores.description: Languages let you seamlessly translate your bot into different languages

stores.name: monitors
stores.description: Monitors run every time any message is posted in any channel the bot can see.

stores.name: providers
stores.description: Providers are how you interact with your database, and store data.

stores.name: tasks
stores.description: Tasks are pre-defined functions which can run on a specific timed schedule.

pieces.name: channelname
pieces.description: An argument for getting channels by name.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: rolename
pieces.description: An argument for getting roles by name.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: username
pieces.description: An argument for getting users by name.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: prefix
pieces.description: Change the prefix for a guild.
pieces.creator: gc

pieces.name: 8ball
pieces.description: An interactive Magic 8ball you can ask questions to.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: banner
pieces.description: Creates an ASCII banner from the string you supply.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: card
pieces.description: Draws random cards from a card deck.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: catfacts
pieces.description: Shows a random fact about cats.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: choice
pieces.description: Makes a decision for you given some choices.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: coinflip
pieces.description: Flips one or more coins.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: chucknorris
pieces.description: Returns a random Chuck Norris joke.

pieces.name: dogfact
pieces.description: Gives you a random dog fact.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: compliment
pieces.description: Compliments a user.
pieces.creator: Kashalls

pieces.name: faceapp
pieces.description: Applies a faceapp filter to an image.
pieces.creator: gc

pieces.name: insult
pieces.description: Insults whoever you mention.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: markov
pieces.description: Generate a markov chain from the text chat.
pieces.creator: gc

pieces.name: randquote
pieces.description: Returns a random quote from someone in the channel.
pieces.creator: gc

pieces.name: shame
pieces.description: Rings a bell on the server shaming the mentioned person.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: trumpquote
pieces.description: Returns a random Donald Trump quote.
pieces.creator: gc

pieces.name: urban
pieces.description: Searches the Urban Dictionary library for a definition to the search term.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: wordcloud
pieces.description: Generate a wordcloud from the messages in a chat.
pieces.creator: gc

pieces.name: yomomma
pieces.description: Returns a random 'Yo Momma' joke.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: dog
pieces.description: Grabs a random dog image.
pieces.creator: linkzyzvg

pieces.name: echo
pieces.description: Send a message to a channel through the bot.

pieces.name: fml
pieces.description: Gets a random FML story.

pieces.name: starboard
pieces.description: Stars a message.
pieces.creator: kyranet

pieces.name: cat
pieces.description: Grabs a random cat image.

pieces.name: ban

pieces.description: Kicks a mentioned user.
